name: ToolBook Translation System File
summary: Learn about .TTS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: TTS files are used for configuring ToolBook LMS applications for multilingual presentation.

description: File used by the ToolBook Translation System (TTS), a localization solution for ToolBook learning management system (LMS) software; similar to an .INI file and saves ToolBook application settings such as the source database format and the supported languages.
